SELECT T1.INSACODE, T1.KNAME, CONCAT(SUBSTR(T1.JUMINID, 1, 6), '-' , SUBSTR(T1.JUMINID, 7, 13)) AS JUMINID, T1.BIRTHDAYGUBUN, T1.SAUPID, T1.SAUPOWNER, T1.ADDRESS, T1.MOBILENO, T1.TELNO, T1.BRANCHCODE, (SELECT BRANCHNAME FROM ba_branchmst WHERE BRANCHCODE = T1.BRANCHCODE) AS BRANCHNAME, T1.DEPTCODE, (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM ba_deptmst WHERE BRANCHCODE = T1.BRANCHCODE AND DEPTCODE = T1.DEPTCODE) AS DEPTNAME, T1.BASICPAY, T1.EMPLOYGUBUN, T1.GRADE, T1.DUTY, T1.JOINDATE, T1.REJOINYN, T1.RETIREDATE, T1.RECOID, (SELECT HR1.KNAME FROM hr_insamst HR1 WHERE HR1.INSACODE = T1.RECOID) AS RECONAME, T1.REMARK FROM hr_insamst T1 WHERE 1=1

AND T1.BRANCHCODE = #S_BRANCHCODE#
AND T1.DEPTCODE = #S_DEPTCODE#
AND T1.JUMINID LIKE '%$S_JUMINID$%'
AND T1.INSACODE = #S_INSACODE#

sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO hr_insamst ( INSACODE, KNAME, JUMINID, SAUPID, SAUPOWNER, ADDRESS, MOBILENO, TELNO, BRANCHCODE, DEPTCODE, BASICPAY, EMPLOYGUBUN, GRADE, DUTY, JOINDATE, REJOINYN, RETIREDATE, RECOID, REMARK, INSERTUSER, INSERTDATE ) VALUES( (select concat(date_format(curdate( ), '%y%m'), LPAD(right(ifnull(max(INSACODE), 0),4) + 1, 4, '0')) from hr_insamst b where left(INSACODE,4) = date_format(curdate( ),'%y%m')), #KNAME#, #JUMINID#, #SAUPID#, #SAUPOWNER#, #ADDRESS#, #MOBILENO#, #TELNO#, #BRANCHCODE#, #DEPTCODE#, #BASICPAY#, #EMPLOYGUBUN#, #GRADE#, #DUTY#, #JOINDATE#, #REJOINYN#, #RETIREDATE#, #RECOID#, #REMARK#, #USERID#, NOW()
)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE hr_insamst SET KNAME = #KNAME#, JUMINID = #JUMINID#, SAUPID = #SAUPID#, SAUPOWNER = #SAUPOWNER#, ADDRESS = #ADDRESS#, MOBILENO = #MOBILENO#, TELNO = #TELNO#, BRANCHCODE = #BRANCHCODE#, DEPTCODE = #DEPTCODE#, BASICPAY = #BASICPAY#, EMPLOYGUBUN = #EMPLOYGUBUN#, GRADE = #GRADE#, DUTY = #DUTY#, JOINDATE = #JOINDATE#, REJOINYN = #REJOINYN#, RETIREDATE = #RETIREDATE#, RECOID = #RECOID#, REMARK = #REMARK#, UPDATEUSER = #USERID#, UPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE INSACODE = #INSACODE#

(SELECT DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl WHERE USEYN = 'Y' AND CCODE = '003' AND DCODE = T1.GRADE) AS GRADE, (SELECT DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl WHERE USEYN = 'Y' AND CCODE = '004' AND DCODE = T1.DUTY) AS DUTY, T1.EMPLOYGUBUN, T1.PREBASICPAY, T1.REMARK FROM hr_appointitem T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.INSACODE = #INSACODE# ORDER BY T1.APPOINTDATE DESC
